message.content:
cs.CG, cs.DS, cs.DM, cs.CC, cs.GT. 

The paper deals with approximation algorithms for art gallery problems in simple polygons, which is a classic problem in computational geometry. Therefore, the most likely category is cs.CG (Computational Geometry). The paper also involves the set covering problem, which falls under the category of cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms). The paper uses approximation algorithms, which is a topic covered in cs.DM (Discrete Mathematics). The paper involves the concept of visibility regions, which is a topic covered in cs.CC (Computational Complexity). Finally, the paper involves proving time bounds, which is a topic covered in cs.GT (Computer Science and Game Theory).
